short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FallacyFilter: AI-powered Chrome extension. Detects biases and fallacies in online text. Your guide to informed, bias-free reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unmask the truth and read beyond the lines with FallacyFilter! This pioneering Chrome extension utilizes cutting-edge AI technology to identify logical fallacies and biases in any text, article or news piece online. Gain the upper hand in understanding the information that shapes your world, and arm yourself against misinformation. Cut through the noise, identify distorted facts, and navigate the digital world confidently with FallacyFilter. Say goodbye to biased news and hello to informed decisions. Start your journey towards a clearer understanding of the media you consume. FallacyFilter - your personal cognitive watchdog.
